title: FUNimation One Piece English Title Font.
content:
It's some kind of chewed up pirate font that FUNimation made specifically for the English episode titles.

Font: 

 Crackhouse by House Industries [1993] 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416003920/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
